# All rights reserved.
#
# April 2015,     R.A. Winters <riwinter@cisco.com>

# XxX.... or
# Xx<desc>X....
#
# desc is the string to label the match in the table
# x is literal and x is one of:
#
# A - address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# I - interface name
# F - floating point number
# H - hex number
# M - mac address
# N - number
# R - newline requires
# P - prefix address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# p - parenthesis - match value inside parens
# S - non-space
# T - time (00:0:00)
# W - word
#
# or XXX<regex>XXX... or
# or XXX<regex><desc>XXX...
#
# regex is a regular expression
# desc is the string to label the match in the table

OS: IOS

CMD: SHOW_VLAN_COUNTERS
SHOWCMD: show vlan counters | no-more
PREFIX: vlan-counters

ACTUAL:
# show vlan counters
Vlan Id                             :759
L2 Unicast Octets                   :--
L2 Unicast Packets                  :--
L2 Multicast Octets                 :--
L2 Multicast Packets                :--
L2 Broadcast Octets                 :--
L2 Broadcast Packets                :--
L2 Unknown Octets                   :--
L2 Unknown Packets                  :--
L3 Routed Octets In                 :--
L3 Routed Packets In                :--
L3 Routed Octets Out                :--
L3 Routed Packets Out               :--
L3 Multicast Octets In              :--
L3 Multicast Packets In             :--
L3 Multicast Octets Out             :--
L3 Multicast Packets Out            :--
L3 Unicast Octets In                :1234
L3 Unicast Packets In               :2345
L3 Unicast Octets Out               :3456
L3 Unicast Packets Out              :4567
Total Octets In                     :179783
Total Packets In                    :1636
Total Octets Out                    :185971
Total Packets Out                   :1792

MARKUP:
Vlan Id                             :XN<vlan-id>X759
L2 Unicast Octets                   :--
L2 Unicast Packets                  :--
L2 Multicast Octets                 :--
L2 Multicast Packets                :--
L2 Broadcast Octets                 :--
L2 Broadcast Packets                :--
L2 Unknown Octets                   :--
L2 Unknown Packets                  :--
L3 Routed Octets In                 :XN<l3-routed-octets-in>X0
L3 Routed Packets In                :XN<l3-routed-pkts-in>X0
L3 Routed Octets Out                :XN<l3-routed-octets-out>X0
L3 Routed Packets Out               :XN<l3-routed-pkts-out>X0
L3 Multicast Octets In              :XN<l3-mcast-octets-in>X0
L3 Multicast Packets In             :XN<l3-mcast-pkts-in>X0
L3 Multicast Octets Out             :XN<l3-mcast-octets-out>X0
L3 Multicast Packets Out            :XN<l3-mcast-pkts-out>X0
L3 Unicast Octets In                :XN<l3-unicast-octets-in>X1234
L3 Unicast Packets In               :XN<l3-unicast-pkts-in>X2345
L3 Unicast Octets Out               :XN<l3-unicast-octets-out>X3456
L3 Unicast Packets Out              :XN<l3-unicast-pkts-out>X4567
Total Octets In                     :XN<total-octets-in>X179783
Total Packets In                    :XN<total-pkts-in>X1636
Total Octets Out                    :XN<total-octets-out>X185971
Total Packets Out                   :XN<total-pkts-out>X1792

OS: NXOS

CMD: SHOW_VLAN_COUNTERS
SHOWCMD: show vlan counters | no-more
PREFIX: vlan-counters

ACTUAL:


Vlan Id                             :2501
Unicast Octets In                  :67684
Unicast Packets In                 :606
Multicast Octets In                :0
Multicast Packets In               :0
Broadcast Octets In                :2400
Broadcast Packets In               :12
Unicast Octets Out                 :157232
Unicast Packets Out                :1212
L3 Unicast Octets In                :0
L3 Unicast Packets In               :0


MARKUP:

Vlan Id                             :XN<vlan-id>X2501
Unicast Octets In                  :XN<total-octets-in>X67684
Unicast Packets In                 :XN<total-pkts-in>X606
Multicast Octets In                :0
Multicast Packets In               :0
Broadcast Octets In                :2400
Broadcast Packets In               :12
Unicast Octets Out                 :XN<total-octets-out>X157232
Unicast Packets Out                :XN<total-pkts-out>X1212
L3 Unicast Octets In                :0
L3 Unicast Packets In               :0
